name: Backdrop
description: This component is a background with a loader inside it.

properties.label: Loader Type
properties.name: loaderType
properties.handlerDescription: Possible: bar, doted circle, line horizon, doted line circle, doted square, line circle, radar

eventHandlers.name: onClick
eventHandlers.label: On Click Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps on the backdrop loader.

eventHandlers.name: onOpen
eventHandlers.label: On Open Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the component appears on the screen

eventHandlers.name: onClose
eventHandlers.label: On Close Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the component disappears from the screen.
